name: DO YOU EVEN LIFT?!
description:
HOWDY, MERC!

Seems the Bureau of Science accidentally set loose a GOOPIDEMIC. Now they're callin' us in to clean up the mess.

Use the ELEVATOR (W/S keys) to bring those frilly WORKERS up to the rooftop for extraction. Our mercenaries will ride down to take care of any Goopoids along the way. You'll also have full access to the facility's door system - open and close those doors (left-click) to keep workers safe and let our mercs in.

You'll earn some of that precious space coin whenever you save a worker. Make sure to spend it outfittin' our Mercs so we can handle harder contracts - they pay the big bucks.

~Captain Vociferous of the Hogga Riders

Developed in 48 hours for the STL Scatterjam in October 2015
